product_name: REI Full Lode Waistpack - Special Buy
long_description: With its 5-liter capacity, the REI Full Lode waistpack has no problem holding all your essentials so you have what you need to enjoy an afternoon on the trail or a full day exploring a new city. Post-consumer recycled PET polyester is tough enough to endure the daily grind. Waistbelt wing is form-fitting and acts as a compression strap to secure load close to body. Main compartment offers plenty of space for essentials like keys, snacks, wallet and map. Front zippered pocket features key clip, a zippered mesh pocket and an organizer for pens and phone or wallet. Front stash pocket with bungee closure offers storage of quick-access items; side mesh water bottle pocket. REI Full Lode waistpack fits waist/hips from 22 - 48 in.; reflective elements increase visibility in low light. Special buy.
short_description: With its 5-liter capacity, the REI Full Lode waistpack has no problem holding all your essentials so you have what you need to enjoy an afternoon on the trail or a full day exploring a new city.
